snippet: Williams matched one of Margaret Court’s records at the Australian Open on Wednesday as she advanced to the third round with a 6-1, 6-2 win over Vesna Dolonc.
abstract: Serena Williams defeats Vesna Dolonc to achieve her 60th career win at the Australian Open, tying record held by Margaret Court; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Williams matched one of Margaret Court’s records at the Australian Open on Wednesday as she advanced to the third round with a 6-1, 6-2 win over Vesna Dolonc.

headline.main: On Scorching Day, Record-Tying Win for Serena Williams
headline.print_headline: On Scorching Day, Record-Tying Win for Williams
